name: Soldier 11
agent_background:
Soldier 11 is a member of the New Eridu Defense Force.
She currently serves as a primary responder in the Obol squad, Obsidian Division. Soldier 11 is a code name â€” her real name remains unknown.
"...My name? I gave it up long ago.
It's only a reminder of my past, and the past makes you weak."

Soldier 11 is a fan of spicy food, and likes the super-spicy noodles served at Waterfall Soup.
It's worth noting she currently calls us by a different name every time she greets us.
Additional information regarding Soldier 11 is still being obtained.

basic_attack.name: Warmup Sparks
basic_attack.description: Unleashes up to 4 slashes, dealing Physical DMG.

basic_attack.name: Fire Suppression
basic_attack.description:
Press Basic Attack at the right moment activate:
Unleashes a set of more powerful slashes, dealing Fire DMG.

dodge.name: Tempered Fire
dodge.description:
A rapid dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

dash_attack.name: Blazing Fire
dash_attack.description: Slashes enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.

dash_attack.name: Fire Suppression
dash_attack.description: Slashes enemies in front, dealing Fire DMG.

dodge_counter.name: Backdraft
dodge_counter.description:
Executes a powerful slash against enemies in front, dealing massive Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

quick_assist.name: Covering Fire
quick_assist.description:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

defensive_assist.name: Hold the Line
defensive_assist.description:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

assist_follow_up.name: Reignition
assist_follow_up.description:
Charge and cross slash enemies in front, dealing Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

special_attack.name: Raging Fire
special_attack.description:
Slashes enemies nearby, dealing Fire DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

ex_special_attack.name: Fervent Fire
ex_special_attack.description:
Slashes enemies nearby, dealing massive Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, Soldier 11's Basic Attacks and Dash Attacks will trigger Fire Suppression for up to 15s or 8 times.

chain_attack.name: Uplifting Flame
chain_attack.description:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, Soldier 11's Basic Attacks and Dash Attacks trigger Fire Suppression for the next 15s, up to 8 times.

ultimate.name: Bellowing Flame
ultimate.description:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, Soldier 11's Basic Attacks and Dash Attacks trigger Fire Suppression for the next 15s, up to 8 times.

core_passive.name: Heatwave
core_passive.description: When triggering Fire Suppression during a Basic Attack or Dash Attack, increase that attack's DMG by 70%.

additional_ability.name: Fields of Fire
additional_ability.description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Soldier 11 deals 10% more Fire DMG. When attacking Stunned enemies, this effect is further enhanced by an additional 22.5%.

mindscape_cinema.name: Rapid Heat
mindscape_cinema.description: When Soldier 11 enters combat or switches in, if her Energy is less than 40, her Energy is recovered to 80. This effect can trigger once every 50s.

mindscape_cinema.name: Scorching Convergence
mindscape_cinema.description: When triggering Fire Suppression, Basic Attack, Dash Attack, and Dodge Counter DMG increases by 3%, up to 12 stacks, lasting 15s, with the duration of each stack calculated separately.

mindscape_cinema.name: Elite Soldier
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Indulgent Blaze
mindscape_cinema.description:
If Fire Suppression is triggered during the 1st, 2nd, or 3rd hit of Soldier 11's Basic Attack or a Dash Attack, Anti-Interrupt Level increases and DMG received is reduced by 18% during skill activation.
If Fire Suppression is triggered during the 4th hit of her Basic Attack, she becomes invulnerable during skill activation.

mindscape_cinema.name: Perfect Soldier
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Scorching Flow
mindscape_cinema.description:
When Soldier 11 uses her EX Special Attack, Chain Attack, or Ultimate, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks).
When Fire Suppression is triggered, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, causing the current move to ignore 25% of the target's Fire RES.
